s: Summary: Invite‑only brunch at Migas Hong Kong offering premium food, free‑flow bubbles and high‑signal conversations among builders, VCs and founders.
Topics: Blockchain security, smart‑contract auditing, Web3 networking, decentralized finance trends.
Speakers: Hashlock security researchers and a curated panel of selected founders and investors.
r: Gain direct access to elite blockchain security experts.
Forge high‑value partnerships in an intimate, agenda‑free setting.
Experience a premium networking environment that accelerates deal flow.
